generated.css: *{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}input:-webkit-autofill{background-color:red;background-image:none}input:focus{background-color:transparent}ol,ul{list-style-type:none}a{color:inherit;text-decoration:none}img{cursor:pointer}.messageSend{box-sizing:border-box;position:fixed;width:104px;padding:10px 20px;background:#00d3aa;border-radius:3px;color:#fff;top:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);display:none}.messageSend.show{display:block;animation:a 4s linear 1}@keyframes a{0%{opacity:1;left:50%}to{left:100%;opacity:0}}.imgView{position:fixed;top:0;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;background:rgba(0,0,0,.7);z-index:2;justify-content:center;align-items:center;display:none}.imgView img{transition:all 1s;width:500px}.imgView.show{display:flex}body{font:16px Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif;line-height:1.62}body nav{position:fixed;top:0;left:0;right:0;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;z-index:1;padding:24px 32px;background-color:transparent;box-shadow:0 0 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2)}body nav .logo{font-size:30px;font-family:monospace;font-weight:900;color:#61d6bd}body nav #menu{display:flex;color:#00d3aa;font-size:16px;font-weight:700}body nav #menu li{border-bottom:3px solid transparent;margin-left:10px;padding:6px}body nav #menu li:hover{color:#3e8c7c;transition:none}body nav #menu li a{padding:6px 8px}body nav #menu li.active a{border-bottom:3px solid #61d6bd}body #fullpage .section{position:relative;height:calc(100vh - 80px);width:100vw;text-align:center}body #fullpage .section .home{height:70%;background-size:cover;background-position:50%;background-image:url(70786728de56c8d905bc13a4c05a078d.jpg);background-repeat:no-repeat}body #fullpage .section .home img:hover{opacity:.4}body #fullpage .section .downPDF{position:absolute;top:85%;right:0;transform:rotate(-45deg)}body #fullpage .section .downPDF
